title: Since we got Demon Vi, does that mean we won't be getting Jade Vi anytime soon Katey?
body:
I think it would be a skin to please another crowd.

Since not everyone likes the busty, demon/ sucubuss, pink/red type skin.

I would prefer the jade dragon skin. With green (fav color) and traditional clothing.

replies.body:
Hey Archenz,

It's not out of the realm of possibility in the future, but it's not likely you'll see another skin for Vi for a bit. 

While dates between skins are a factor in determining which champions are getting skins, it's not the only factor. If we wanted to pursue this particular skin thematic, say for something like Lunar Revel (not promising here, just using this as an example), the fact that she got a skin in October wouldn't rule her out as a potential candidate for a Lunar Revel skin if we felt the concept for the skin was strong and fit the year's theme.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=jxt2VXdE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-21T16:26:48.064+0000)
>
> Hey Archenz,
> 
> It's not out of the realm of possibility in the future, but it's not likely you'll see another skin for Vi for a bit. 
> 
> While dates between skins are a factor in determining which champions are getting skins, it's not the only factor. If we wanted to pursue this particular skin thematic, say for something like Lunar Revel (not promising here, just using this as an example), the fact that she got a skin in October wouldn't rule her out as a potential candidate for a Lunar Revel skin if we felt the concept for the skin was strong and fit the year's theme.

You guys haven't forgetten about {{champion:56}} right? His last skin was like december 2012.
Kennen's last was a entire year before that,  so yeah, join the club.

> [{quoted}](name=Angelofchaos16x,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=jxt2VXdE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-21T20:10:46.613+0000)
>
> Kennen's last was a entire year before that,  so yeah, join the club.

Yeah but Kennen's ugly, no one likes Kennen.

1+.

I use to main noc back when I didn't know anything about the game.

Now... I realize he needs some changes. 
But I still love his kit.

The only change he needs is his q letting him go through walls.

Thanks for responding. 

I honestly love the skin. Mostly the wings animations on q and hot only. Very well done in my opinion.

It's not my type of skin but very well done nonetheless. 
I will probably be buying it since (don't tell anyone) vi is my freelo cow.
